name: Harvester of Sorrow
wikiSummary: Harvester of Sorrow is the sixth track off Metallica's 1988 album ...And Justice For All.  Harvester of Sorrow is a about a drunken father who comes home and tortures and kills his family.
wikiText:
Harvester of Sorrow is the sixth track off Metallica's 1988 album ...And Justice For All.
 
 Harvester of Sorrow is a about a drunken father who comes home and tortures and kills his family.
